SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_NM, A.POLL_BGNDE POLL_BEGIN_DE, A.POLL_ENDDE POLL_END_DE, A.POLL_KND POLL_KIND_CODE, A.POLL_DSUSE_ENNC, A.POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POLL_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT(POLL_ID) POLL_ID FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLIEM)
AND POLL_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE WHERE 1=1
AND POLL_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_NM, A.POLL_BGNDE POLL_BEGIN_DE, A.POLL_ENDDE POLL_END_DE, A.POLL_KND POLL_KIND_CODE, A.POLL_DSUSE_ENNC, A.POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POLL_ID=#pollId#
SELECT POLL_ID, POLL_IEM_ID, POLL_IEM_NM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLIEM WHERE 1=1 AND POLL_ID = #pollId# ORDER BY POLL_IEM_NM DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT ( POLL_ID, POLL_IEM_ID, POLL_RESULT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #pollId#, #pollIemId#, #pollResultId#, sysdate, #frstRegisterId#, sysdate, #lastUpdusrId# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT WHERE POLL_ID = #pollId# AND FRST_REGISTER_ID = #frstRegisterId#

SELECT A.POLL_IEM_ID, COUNT(A.POLL_IEM_ID) POLL_IEM_ID_CNT, ROUND((100/ (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT WHERE POLL_ID = A.POLL_ID) ) * COUNT(A.POLL_IEM_ID)) POLL_IEM_PERCENT FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POLL_ID = #pollId# GROUP BY A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_IEM_ID
